titleText: Farmvizion leverages AI and IoT to transform farms into intelligent ecosystems—monitor, diagnose, and act in real time.
IdentifyPlant-: Identify plant diseases, pests, and health issues using AI-powered analysis of images and data.
MonitorSoil-: Monitor soil, climate, and crop conditions in real-time with intelligent sensor networks.
ReceiveAlerts-: Receive alerts and treatment suggestions tailored to each crop and region.
ConnectWithUs: Connect with us and bring intelligence to your fields.
AtFarmVizion-: At Farmvizion, we are redefining the way agriculture works. By integrating AI-driven image analysis and IoT-based sensing into farming practices, we empower farmers with real-time, data-backed decisions to increase yield, reduce loss, and promote sustainable farming.
WeAim-: We aim to build intelligent agricultural systems that help farmers make precise and timely decisions using modern technologies like computer vision, edge computing, and sensor fusion.
ToEnable-: To enable every farmer—regardless of scale—to harness the power of AI and IoT for smarter, more resilient farming across the globe.
Realtime-: Real-time plant health diagnostics from handheld and remote cameras
EdgeComputing-: Edge computing integration with offline-first support
CustomAI-: Custom AI models fine-tuned for specific crops and regions
MultiSensor-: Multi-sensor compatibility with soil, moisture, and climate inputs
GotQuestions-: Got questions or want to collaborate? Reach out to us at developer@farmvizion.com
privacyIntro: At Farmvizion, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.
infoWeCollectDesc: We may collect personal information such as name, email, farm location, and agricultural preferences. Location may be used to personalize insights.
useOfInformationDesc: Your data is used to provide tailored agricultural insights, send notifications, and improve our platform features.
dataSharingDesc: We do not sell your data. We may share anonymized data with researchers or partners to improve agricultural models.
yourRightsDesc: You may request access to, correction, or deletion of your data at any time by contacting our support team.
termsIntro: Welcome to Farmvizion. By accessing or using our platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms. Please read them carefully.
useOfPlatformDesc: You must use the platform in accordance with all applicable laws and for agricultural purposes only. Misuse will result in account suspension.
accountResponsibilitiesDesc: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities under your account.
dataAccuracyDesc: The agricultural data provided is based on best-effort forecasts and analysis. It should not be the sole basis for critical farming decisions.
modificationsDesc: Farmvizion reserves the right to update or modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of changes via email or the platform.
